length may be too short to provide the best information for the recognition process.
— A Dynamic Sliding Window Approach for Activity Recognition , 2011.
It is unclear whether windows with overlap are required for a given problem. In the adoption
of neural network models, the use of overlaps, such as a 50% overlap, will double the size of the
training data, which may aid in modeling smaller datasets, but may also lead to models that
overﬁt the training dataset.
